help.info: A gateway function to CLP solver (without errorchecks)
help.descr:
The function implements call to CLP solver based on formulation from Opt class. Only QP and LP problems are supported.
It is assumed that QP/LP entering this function (for LP H=0) is of the form
\begin{eqnarray} \min && {\frac{1}{2}} {x}^{T}Hx+{f}^{T}x \label{eq:clp:QP0-obj} \\ \text{s.t.} && \text{lb} \le x \le \text{ub} \label{eq:clp:QP0-ineq1} \\ && Ax \le b \label{eq:clp:QP0-ineq2}\\ && {A}_{e}x = {b}_{e} \label{eq:clp:QP0-eq} \end{eqnarray}
which is passed to CLP solver directly.

field.name: H
field.descr: Quadratic part of the objective function.

field.name: f
field.descr: Linear part of the objective function.

field.name: A
field.descr: Linear part of the inequality constraints Ax \le b.

field.name: b
field.descr: Right hand side of the inequality constraints Ax \le b.

field.name: Ae
field.descr: Linear part of the equality constraints {A}_{e}x=b_{e}.

field.name: be
field.descr: Right hand side of the equality constraints {A}_{e}x=b_{e}.

field.name: lb
field.descr: Lower bound for the variables x \ge \text{lb}.

field.name: ub
field.descr: Upper bound for the variables x \le \text{ub}.

field.name: m
field.descr: Number of inequalities in Ax \le b.

field.name: problem_type
field.descr: A string specifying the problem to be solved.

field.name: test
field.descr: Call (false) or not to call (true) MPT global settings.

field.name: exitflag
field.descr: An integer value that informs if the result was feasible (1), or otherwise (different from 1).

field.name: how
field.descr: A string that informs if the result was feasible ('ok'), or if any problem appeared through optimization.
